name: Mist Legacy
storyline:
The heroes come from the land of the Mist. A mysterious place that has been taken out of the timeline of the rest of the world for an unknown purpose. You play as a Mistwalker, an individual trained to explore and repel the mist around Valsonge, the last city where humans live in the Mist.

But things are about to change, you and the other Mistwalkers discover a way to exit the Mist. You must explore this new world and understand the Mist's purpose.

The story of Mist Legacy takes place in the province of Ordval in the continent of Myriaden.
summary:
Mist Legacy is a MMORPG created by Virtys. The game offer an intricate gameplay system presented in a simple top-view cartographic environment.

Mist Legacy use turn-based combat, skill-based progression and material distribution scheme for crafting.
